attributes.action: Adopt a policy to create an elected committee to decide MP expense range and levels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A committe be formed to regulate all aspects of MP expenses , and such committee be formed on a pro rata basis to the averages found within the country, in order to be truely representative of the feelings of the population as a whole. (i.e. 8% ceiling from public schools, 50 % to be women, no one employment sector of the community to hold more than 10% of the seats on the committee.That elections be based on the regions of the country (UK) in order to create a diverse geographical mix on the committee. No MPs, relatives, Senior Civil Servants or relatives, be permitted to serve on the committee.That all service to the committee be unpaid, save reimbursement of "actual" travel, wage loss, and overnight accomodation charges at local hotel to the committee site, and that the committee be located at a point central within the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
